Trigger.name: Groupie Hit Highlight
Trigger.script:
for k,v in ipairs(gmcp.Char.Group.List or {}) do local FixedName = string.gsub(v.name or "", "|%w+|", "") if matches[4] and string.lower(FixedName) == string.lower(matches[4]) then selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 0, 0) setBgColor(0, 255, 255)
local selectedName = matches[4] if selectedName and #selectedName > 0 then selectString(selectedName, 1) setFgColor(255, 255, 255) -- Set name foreground color to white setBgColor(255, 0, 0) -- Set background color to red deselect() end end end

Alias.name: QXL self spells
Alias.script:
send ("wake") send ("config -savespell") send ("c concentrate") send ("c savvy") send ("sleep") --tempTimer(240,[[send("config +savespell")]])
-- Create a temporary timer and store its ID local QXLtimerID = tempTimer(240, function() echo("Time's up! Turning on Savespell now...
") send("config +savespell") end)
-- Display the remaining time on the timer echo("You have " .. remainingTime(QXLtimerID) .. " seconds till Quixoltan spells tick down to sync with Kra...
")
-- Display 3 minutes remaining tempTimer(60,[[echo("You have 3 minutes remaining...
")]])
-- Display 2 minutes remaining tempTimer(120,[[echo("You have 2 minutes remaining...
")]])
-- Display 1 minute remaining local MysticaltimerID = tempTimer(180, function() echo("You have 1 minute remaining...
") echo("Casting Mystical Barrier
") send("wake") send("c 'mystical barrier'") send("sleep") end)
-- Display 20 secconds remaining tempTimer(220,[[echo("You have 20 seconds remaining...
")]])

Script.name: speedwalk
Script.script:
walklist = {} walkdelay = 0
function speedwalktimer() send(walklist[1]) table.remove(walklist, 1) if #walklist>0 then tempTimer(walkdelay, [[speedwalktimer()]]) end end
function speedwalk(dirString, backwards, delay) local dirString = dirString:lower() walklist = {} walkdelay = delay local reversedir = { n = "s", en = "sw", e = "w", es = "nw", s = "n", ws = "ne", w = "e", wn = "se", u = "d", d = "u", ni = "out", tuo = "in" }
if not backwards then for count, direction in string.gmatch(dirString, "([0-9]*)([neswudio][ewnu]?t?)") do count = (count == "" and 1 or count) for i=1, count do if delay then walklist[#walklist+1] = direction else send(direction) end end end else for direction, count in string.gmatch(dirString:reverse(), "(t?[ewnu]?[neswudio])([0-9]*)") do count = (count == "" and 1 or count) for i=1, count do if delay then walklist[#walklist+1] = reversedir[direction] else send(reversedir[direction]) end end end end
if walkdelay then speedwalktimer() end
end

Script.name: Loot Manager
